Reviews.Title: If series 6300 models are still available they are worth consideration
Reviews.Author: GaryM
Reviews.Content: The TV is  great, not  3D, but has an excellent program guide feature  much like cable systems provide even tho I use it with rabbit ears.  I have 6500 series 3D Samsungs, they do not have as good a program guide.  I use the guide several times a day--never even tried the 3D.  The surge protector etc seem adequate but not a deal maker or breaker.

ProductInfo.Features:
UN32F6300 32 inch 1080p 120hz Slim LED Smart HDTV with WiFi
Home/Office Surge Protector Power Kit (270 joules protection)
2 6 ft High Speed 3D Ready 120hz Ready 1080p HDMI Cables
Performance TV/LCD Screen Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN32F6300 32" 120hz 1080p WiFi LED Slim Smart HDTV Surge Protector Bundle - Includes HDTV, Surge Protector Power Kit (270 joules protection), 2 6 ft High Speed 3D Ready 120hz Ready 1080p HDMI Cables, and Performance TV/LCD Screen Cleaning Kit
